name: Flapping Thread
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Donquixote Pirates
effect: [Counter] If your Leader has the {Donquixote Pirates} type, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 4 or less.
